title: Senior Hybrid Mobile Developer
jobDescription:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced Hybrid Mobile App Developer to play a key role in building and maintaining our mobile application. As a Hybrid Mobile App Developer, you will work closely with our development team to design, develop, and enhance our mobile app using modern hybrid mobile app development frameworks and technologies. The ideal candidate has a strong background in mobile app development, a passion for creating user-friendly experiences, and a commitment to delivering high-quality software solutions.
 
Responsibility:
  • Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend developers to define and refine mobile app requirements and features.
  • Design and develop user-friendly and intuitive hybrid mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms using Flutter framework.
  • Ensure high performance, responsiveness, and reliability of the mobile app by conducting thorough testing, troubleshooting, and debugging.
  • Work closely with the UI/UX designers to implement visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.
  • Collaborate with backend developers to define and integrate APIs and web services required for mobile app functionality.
  • Optimize mobile app performance by implementing best practices and industry standards.
  • Stay updated on emerging trends, technologies, and best practices in hybrid mobile app development, and apply this knowledge to improve our mobile app development processes.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and address issues and bugs, ensuring the mobile apps stability and usability.
  • Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality, maintainability, and adherence to coding standards.
  • Assist in app deployment and updates to app stores, ensuring a smooth release process.
  • Continuously monitor and enhance the mobile apps performance, user experience, and security
Requirements:
  • Bachelors degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field.
  • Proven experience as a Hybrid Mobile App Developer, developing and delivering cross-platform mobile applications.
  • Strong proficiency in hybrid mobile app development frameworks such as React Native, Flutter, or Ionic.
  • Solid understanding of JavaScript, Dart, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS.
  • Experience in integrating mobile apps with RESTful APIs and web services.
  • Familiarity with mobile app design principles and user experience (UX) best practices.
  • Knowledge of mobile app performance optimization techniques and tools.
  • Understanding of version control systems (e.g., Git, TFS) and agile development methodologies.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.
  • Familiarity with the real estate industry or property management software is a plus.

ambitionBoxData.Title: Datamatics Global Services Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Greetings!!!


This is in regards to a Job opportunity for UiPath Developer with Datamatics Global Services Ltd.


About us: Datamatics is a technology company that builds intelligent solutions enabling data-driven businesses to digitally transform themselves through Robotics, Artificial Intelligence, Cloud, Mobility and Advanced Analytics. Headquartered in Mumbai, the company has a presence across America, Australia, Asia and Europe.


Position: UiPath Developer

Website: https://www.datamatics.com/

Job Location: Andheri (E) - Mumbai

Mode of Interview: Microsoft teams Interview (Video call)

Work hours: 4:30 PM IST to 12:30 AM IST


Job Description:

  • 4-6 years of UiPath experience
  • Work timing will be 4.30 pm 12.30 am India time
  • UiPath Developer and Advance Developer Certification Preferable
  • Design, Develop and Implement automation workflows using UiPath to streamline business processes.
  • Hands-on experience in Re- Framework, UiPath components: Robot/Assistant, Studio and Orchestrator
  • Hands-on Experience in Excel Automation, Email Automation, Windows, Web and Enterprise-wide applications
  • Monitoring the Jobs/Logs on the UiPath environment and Exception handling
  • Work closely with the business team to identify project requirements and Prepare Process Design Documents and Solution Design Documents
  • Experience on working on SharePoint and Workday will be an advantage
  • Support existing processes in Production and UAT
  • Implement change requirements as part of a structured change control process.
  • Provide solution designs during the project implementation phase.
  • Responsible for the overall testing of the Solution, including PreProd and UAT
  • Performing Technical feasibility based on the requirements
  • Ability to translate and summarize complex technical information into understandable, actionable information
  • Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills
  • Strong Problem-Solving and Analytical Skills

Regards,
Veronica Fernandes
Corporate HRD

Talent Acquisition Team

(E): veronica.fernandes@datamatics.com

title: Skill Trainer

ambitionBoxData.Title: Apeejay Stya Group Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Job Description: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Public Speaking, Entrepreneurship, and Data Science (Python and AI). As a Trainer, you will be responsible for delivering engaging and informative training sessions to our diverse group of learners. If you are passionate about teaching and have expertise in these areas, we would love to hear from you!


Role & responsibilities


1. **Conduct Training Sessions:**

  • Deliver high-quality training sessions on Public Speaking, Entrepreneurship, and Data Science (Python and AI).
  • Utilize a variety of instructional techniques and formats to enhance learning and retention.

2. **Curriculum Development:**

  • Develop and update training materials, handouts, and presentations.
  • Customize training content to meet the specific needs of different learner groups.

3. **Assessment and Feedback:**

  • Assess the progress of participants through quizzes, assignments, and practical exercises.
  • Provide constructive feedback to learners to help them improve their skills.

4. **Engagement and Interaction:**

  • Foster a positive and interactive learning environment.
  • Encourage active participation and engagement from all learners.

5. **Mentorship:**

  • Provide mentorship and guidance to learners, helping them apply their skills in real-world scenarios.
  • Support learners in their personal and professional development.


Preferred candidate profile

  • Bachelors degree in a relevant field. Master’s degree or professional certifications in Public Speaking, Entrepreneurship, Data Science, or related areas are preferred.
  • Minimum of 2 years of experience in the relevant experience.
  • Proven experience as a Trainer or in a similar teaching role.
  • Expertise in Public Speaking, Entrepreneurship, and Data Science (Python and AI).
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.
  • Ability to explain complex concepts in an easy-to-understand manner.
  • Experience with curriculum development and instructional design.
  • Strong organizational and time-management skills.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Perks and benefits
